DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: California Energy Seeks to Add Directors to Magma Board : In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission , the company said Magma Power Co . shareholders will be asked to vote on adding four California Energy nominees as directors , expanding the number to 15.The board recommended Monday that shareholders reject California Energy Co. ' s $ 434-million , $ 35-a-share bid for 51 % of the San Diego-based company . Mark Harnett , a spokesman for California Energy , said the Omaha-based company hasn ' t chosen its nominees , " though I ' m sure the company has a_few in mind. " Both Magma and California Energy operate geothermal power_plants .
